list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the quality of being amusing or comic, especially as expressed in literature or speech.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his tales are full of humor
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Câu chuyện của anh ấy đầy sự hài hước

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a mood or state of mind.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: hài hước của cô biến mất

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: each of the four chief fluids of the body (blood, phlegm, yellow bile (choler), and black bile (melancholy)) that were thought to determine a person's physical and mental qualities by the relative proportions in which they were present.
comply with the wishes of (someone) in order to keep them content, however unreasonable such wishes might be.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she was always humoring him to prevent trouble
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô luôn hài hước với anh để tránh rắc rối
